content: Every artist dips his brush in his own soul and paints his own nature into his pictures. – Henry Ward Beecher
Dadaism emerged as an anti-art movement during World War I, challenging traditional artistic norms.
The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls. – Pablo Picasso
The purpose of art is washing the dust of daily life off our souls. – Pablo Picasso
Art enables us to find ourselves and lose ourselves at the same time. – Thomas Merton
